00023 #ifndef UVM_IDS_H
00024 #define UVM_IDS_H
00025 
00026 #include "sysc/utils/sc_report.h"
00027 
00028 
00029 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00030 // Report ids (uvm) following the style of SystemC kernel message reporting.
00031 //
00032 // Report ids in the range of 1-100.
00033 
00034 // If SystemC kernel is modified to be aware of the UVM message ids,
00035 // then sysc/utils/sc_utils_ids.cpp has to include this file, and 
00036 // has to define UVM_DEFINE_MESSAGE suitably with an offset added 
00037 // to the message id such that the id does not clash with any id 
00038 // already used by the SystemC kernel.  
00039 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00040 
00041 #ifndef UVM_DEFINE_MESSAGE
00042 #define UVM_DEFINE_MESSAGE(id, unused, text) \
00043  namespace sc_core { extern const char id[]; }
00044 #endif
00045 
00046 //
00047 // UVM-SC messages
00048 //
00049 
00050 UVM_DEFINE_MESSAGE(UVM_MULTIPLE_STOP_PROCS_    , 1,
00051         "uvm_component has multiple children named 'stop'; did you mistakenly declare 'SC_THREAD(stop)'?")
00052 UVM_DEFINE_MESSAGE(UVM_PACKER_UNPACK_INDEX_, 2,
00053         "uvm_packer unpack_index > pack_index")
00054 UVM_DEFINE_MESSAGE(UVM_PACKER_UNPACK_OBJECT_, 3,
00055         "uvm_packer unpack_object failed")
00056 UVM_DEFINE_MESSAGE(UVM_CREATOR_NOT_FOUND_, 4,
00057         "uvm creator not found for type")
00058 UVM_DEFINE_MESSAGE(UVM_CREATOR_NOT_OBJECT_, 5,
00059         "uvm creator is not an object creator")
00060 UVM_DEFINE_MESSAGE(UVM_CREATOR_NOT_COMP_, 6,
00061         "uvm creator is not a component creator")
00062 UVM_DEFINE_MESSAGE(UVM_OVERRIDE_EXISTS_, 7,
00063         "uvm type override already exists")
00064 UVM_DEFINE_MESSAGE(UVM_CONFIG_INTERNAL_, 8,
00065         "uvm config internal error")
00066 UVM_DEFINE_MESSAGE(UVM_UNPACK_DCAST_, 9,
00067         "DCAST from uvm_object failed in uvm_packer operator >>")
00068 UVM_DEFINE_MESSAGE(UVM_PACK_NULL_, 10,
00069         "Attempt to pack null uvm_object")
00070 UVM_DEFINE_MESSAGE(UVM_UNPACK_OBJ_NO_METADATA_, 11,
00071         "Attempt to unpack uvm_object without metadata")
00072 
00073 #endif
